title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water.
Mix hot pasta with pancetta, then add egg mixture off heat.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Cook onions and tomatoes with spices until soft.
Blend into a smooth sauce and simmer.
Add grilled chicken and serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Crispy toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, olive oil, and a sprinkle of chili flakes.
instructions: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Mash avocado with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
